name: supermemory
title: Supermemory
description: Add and search memories with your personal AI-powered knowledge base
author: supermemory

commands.name: add-memory
commands.title: Add Memory
commands.subtitle: Supermemory
commands.description: Add text, URLs, or documents to your supermemory knowledge base

commands.name: search-memories
commands.title: Search Memories
commands.subtitle: Supermemory
commands.description: Search through your saved memories and find relevant information

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.subtitle: Supermemory
commands.description: Search through your saved projects and find relevant information

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Supermemory API Key. Get it from https://supermemory.link/raycast

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
